name: Climbros
detailed_description:
CLIMB
Climb, jump, swing. Invent your own climbing style: effective and attractive! Overcome obstacles lying before you and reach your goal the most efficient way.

EXPLORE

Test your skills in various conditions. Snowy rocks, enormous trees or drifting asteroids are just few of many challanges waiting for you. On your way you’ll find
tons of unique locations and characters.

COOPERATE
Climb together with your friends. Find out if you can cooperate to achive your common goal, when fate of the team depends equally on each member. Will you achieve a perfect symbiosis as an ultimate climbing machine?
about_the_game:
CLIMB
Climb, jump, swing. Invent your own climbing style: effective and attractive! Overcome obstacles lying before you and reach your goal the most efficient way.

EXPLORE

Test your skills in various conditions. Snowy rocks, enormous trees or drifting asteroids are just few of many challanges waiting for you. On your way you’ll find

COOPERATE
Climb together with your friends. Find out if you can cooperate to achive your common goal, when fate of the team depends equally on each member. Will you achieve a perfect symbiosis as an ultimate climbing machine?
short_description: Climbros is an addictive two-dimensional arcade game in which you will be able to climb. You can play in single player mode or with a group of friends in local cooperation mode. Surprise, amusement, helplessness, joy, satisfaction - expect a whole range of emotions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4010U or AMD Quad-Core A8-6410
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
